about_the_game:
Greetings, space cheetah pilot!

Play the first 4 levels in this DEMO!

Prepare to:

- Run over speedboosters to blast across levels!

- Surf falling solar panels and hitch a ride on passing satellites.

- Play low G space soccer.

- Ramp off anything! With enough speed, you'll ramp across the ENTIRE LEVEL!

- Blaze your own trail! The levels are sandboxes, crammed full of shortcuts and exploits. A speed runner's dream!

- Groove to an incredible soundtrack!

- Hunt for Ghost Node anomalies. Each one unlocks a memory (or is it a precognition?) about the Traveler’s mysterious journey through the solar system.

Greetings, space cheetah pilot!

- Hunt for Ghost Node anomalies. Each one unlocks a memory (or is it a precognition?) about the Traveler’s mysterious journey through the solar system.
name: Space Cheetah Hyper Runner Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti (or equivalent)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti (or equivalent)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Play the first 4 levels in the demo version! Race across low gravity sci-fi sandbox circuits and explore levels for shortcuts! Features unique ramping mechanics - ramp across entire levels! Wholesome high speed fun for everyone :)
